sentences.en: ...fruits and vegetables that will be canned, skinned, diced, or otherwise processed.
sentences.cn: …将要经过装罐、去皮、切块或其他加工程序的水果和蔬菜。

sentences.en: "Can you walk all right?" the nurse asked him.
sentences.cn: “你走路有困难吗？”护士问他。

sentences.en: "I can't give you an answer now," he hedged.
sentences.cn: “我现在不能回答你，”他闪避道。

sentences.en: a Coke can
sentences.cn: 可乐罐

sentences.en: Applying the dye can be messy, particularly on long hair.
sentences.cn: 涂抹染发剂可能会搞得一团糟，特别是长发。

sentences.en: But legal experts are not sure if such a charge can stick.
sentences.cn: 但法律专家们不能肯定这一指控是否成立。

sentences.en: By golly we can do something about it this time.
sentences.cn: 这次我们确实可以采取行动了。

sentences.en: Can you smell something burning?
sentences.cn: 你闻到什么东西烧焦了吗？

sentences.en: Don't worry yourself about me, I can take care of myself.
sentences.cn: 别为我担心，我会照顾好自己的。

sentences.en: Even a small personal computer can store vast amounts of information.
sentences.cn: 即使是一台小型个人电脑，也能储存大量的信息。

sentences.en: Gabriella can speak French fluently.
sentences.cn: 加布里埃拉能讲一口流利的法语。

sentences.en: He can’t remember where he put the tickets.
sentences.cn: 他记不起把票放在哪儿了。

sentences.en: Here they are – I can see their car.
sentences.cn: 他们来了——我看到他们的汽车了。

sentences.en: I can never, ever forgive him. I despise him.
sentences.cn: 我永远不会原谅他。我鄙视他。

sentences.en: I can't give you details because I don't actually have any details.
sentences.cn: 我无法告诉你详情，因为我确实不了解具体情况。

sentences.en: I can’t understand why you’re so upset.
sentences.cn: 我不明白你为何这么沮丧。

sentences.en: I have a fair idea of how difficult things can be.
sentences.cn: 我大致了解情况会有多困难。

sentences.en: I pried the top off a can of chilli.
sentences.cn: 我揭开一罐辣椒的盖子。

sentences.en: I'm a blood donor; I can't risk any contagion.
sentences.cn: 我是献血者，我不能冒任何接触传染的危险。

sentences.en: I’m afraid Mr Harding can’t see you now – he’s busy.
sentences.cn: 抱歉，哈丁先生此刻不能见你，他正在忙。

sentences.en: Jovial ladies chivvy you into ordering more than you can eat!
sentences.cn: 热情的女招待会一再推荐，最后点的餐多到吃不下!

sentences.en: The happiest are not those who own all the best things, but those who can appreciate the beauty of life.
sentences.cn: 最幸福的人们并不一定什么都是最好，只是他们懂得欣赏生活的美好。

sentences.en: The police are doing all they can to find her.
sentences.cn: 警方正在尽一切所能寻找她。

sentences.en: The United States will do whatever it can to help Greece.
sentences.cn: 美国将尽一切所能帮助希腊。

sentences.en: to question the traditional model of education &B{opens up} too big &B{a can of worms}.
sentences.cn: 质疑传统教育模式会引起一场轩然大波。

sentences.en: Two large cans of paint ought to be enough.
sentences.cn: 两大桶油漆应该够了。

sentences.en: Victorian houses can seem cold with their lofty ceilings and rambling rooms.
sentences.cn: 维多利亚式房屋屋顶高耸，房间布局凌乱，因此可能会显得较为阴冷。

sentences.en: Water can be purified by boiling for five minutes.
sentences.cn: 水煮沸5分钟便可得到净化。

sentences.en: You can chat to other people who are online.
sentences.cn: 你可以和其他在线的人聊天。

sentences.en: You can swim, can’t you?
sentences.cn: 你会游泳，是吗？

sentences.en: You have to do everything you can. You have to work your hardest. And if you do, if you stay positive, then you have a shot at a silver lining.
sentences.cn: 你必须全力以赴，最大限度地去努力。如果你这么做，并且保持乐观，你就会看见乌云背后的幸福线。

phrases.tran_cn: 复杂难解决的事；棘手的事
正如你所看到的；你是知道的
需要，希望得到；能对付，将就
禁不住，忍不住；情不自禁
棉条桶；纸板桶；纤维罐；纤维板桶
(非正式)（磁带）录制好的，（电影）拍摄好的，准备播放（或发行）的
是的，我们可以（奥巴马竞选口号）

trans.tran_en: to be able to do something or to know how to do something
a special metal container that keeps the liquid inside it under pressure. The liquid is released as a  spray  when you press the button
When food or drink is canned, it is put into a metal container and sealed so that it will remain fresh.
You use can to indicate that someone has the ability or opportunity to do something
